Service Workers

Recently Iâ€™ve experimented with Googleâ€™s Workbox library. It provides abstractions for common caching strategies, amongst other tasks. It can be as simple as providing a URL (or regex pattern):

  /\.(gif|jpeg|jpg|png|svg)$/,

In the example above all images with a matching file extension are fetched from the cache first if available, otherwise from the network (then cached).
